ModulePrefs.description: Play card games in Google Wave.
ModulePrefs.author: Charles Lehner

Module.Content:
Cards

    Welcome to the cards gadget!

    Click and drag cards to move them around. To move several at once, select them by dragging a box around them. To add a card to the selection, shift-click it. You can tell which cards you have selected because they will have a dotted gray border.

    Buttons

    Close this help box.
    Show this help box.
    Rotate your view of the board 180°, so you can play across from another person.
    Add a new deck.
    Delete a deck.

    Keys

    Pressing these keys will affect the cards currently selected.

    F
    Flip.
    S
    Shuffle.
    U
    Lets you to drag cards behind other cards.
    P
    Peek. Look at the other side of the cards without other participants seeing. You can tell when someone is peeking at a card because it will have a dotted border.
    P+L
    Peek lock. Press P while holding L to continuously peek at a card. This simulates you holding the cards in your hand so that no one but you can see them.
